rationale: Condensed platelet-vs-factor overview into high-yield diagnostic split with preserved clinical pattern logic.

Normalized second hemostasis tree into cleaner primary/secondary branch framework.
Integrated MAHA razor-wire concept with TTP/HUS/ITP management without narrative filler.
Retained ITP treatment thresholds, mixing-study table, lupus anticoagulant paradox, and DIC overview.
Preserved DIC acute/chronic distinction and reversal-agent table with vitamin K context.
Trimmed recap and transition chatter while keeping reversal and mixing-study high-yield rules.
Reframed oncology complications into acute-vs-late effects with exposure-based survivorship risks.

Converted mixed recap text to structured survivorship/crisis-management action table and removed quiz prompts.
